summary: Building to SDK level 16 causing misaligned overlays and sometimes crashing.

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Build to SDK level 16 2. The compass rendering fails which causes the map orientation to shift and some cases crashes. http://www.yousaytoo.com/display-compass-on-osmdroid-mapview/2807827

Our samples are now built at SDK level 16 and working properly.

Make sure you turn off hardware acceleration in your manifest or in code as we do in MapFragment.
